This vignette from the R package JMDplots contains plots from the paper by Dick et al. (2019) (preprint).

```{r JMDplots, message = FALSE, results = "hide"}
library(JMDplots)
```

## Basis species comparison (Figure 1)
```{r gradH2O1, message = FALSE, echo = 1, fig.align='center', out.width='100%', out.height='550px'}
gradH2O1(TRUE)
knitr::include_graphics("gradH2O1.pdf")
```
